p: SW has been employed to extract several compounds from Eucalyptus species. According to Wu et al. [ 128], the ideal condition of SW extraction oil is under 300 Â°C for 30 min, which is enough to obtain 30.1% of bio-oil. In addition, Kulkarni et al. [ 126] reported the use of SW for the extraction of antioxidants from E. grandis. Jimenez-Carmona and de Castro [ 112] isolated Eucalyptus essential oil by using SW technique.
